page.title: 05THE PEOPLE.
page.content: The number of people in the village of{Harby}is{about 800}(1985). The population of Harby has remained about the same for the past 100 years.In 1871 there were 539 people.In 1971 there were 678 people. The village has gained a number of new residents attracted by the{rural environment,the nice houses, {the employment in the area and the {easy travelling distance to large {cities .}There are about 300 houses in the village. In Harby the children go to school.Some girls go to Guides and Brownies.Some boys go to Cubs.At the weekends people go shopping at Melton Mowbray or Grantham or Nottingham.
